Title: The Lure of the Basilisk.

Authors: Lawrence Watt-Evans.

Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=n5J-84oiCbQC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&edge=curl&source=gbs_api.
Description: The overman named Garth sought immortal fame. The oracle told him to serve the Forgotten King to get that fame. But this King sent Garth after a basilisk whose gaze could turn men to stone. What sane use could anyone have for a monster like that?.
